channel.title: RSS on Boffin The Tinkerer
channel.description: Recent content in RSS on Boffin The Tinkerer

item.title: Self-Hosting FreshRSS
item.description: Self-Hosting FreshRSS is kind of pointless as a single user but I’m going to do it anyway. Just one more self-hosted app then I’ll stop.

item.title: Iceshrimp.NET RSS Bot
item.description: Turn an RSS feed into an Iceshrimp note. Send either the latest RSS entry or a stream of Iceshrimp posts.

item.title: RSS to Toot
item.description: Turn an RSS feed in to a Mastodon toot. Send either the latest RSS entry or a stream of Mastodon posts.
